name: FireFly (itch) (Ai Xia)
description:
Controls:

  • Use WASD to move around (up, right, left, down).

If you need a hint:

  • The game lasts around 5-10 minutes. If it doesn't make sense at first, please keep playing. 

Install Instructions:

  • Unzip the file and run Firefly.exe

For more details on Firefly, visit my Notion.
